idea:
SnackX is an on demand Food & Beverages delivery platform that bring the nearby Eateries to users doorstep. 


The Startup is helping Food Joints / Homemakers to expand and grow their business locally with In-built facilities like Order Processing, Payment and Delivery service
name: EZMART INTERNET SERVICES INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
ChiniMandi.com is a venture of the parent company Innoplats Infotech Pvt. Ltd, which is one of the top notch professional tech provider companies; transforming clients’ businesses, operating and technology models for the digital era.
The organisation aims to enhance the circumferences of its customers businesses and & make them flourish by provisions of digital platforms.
The unique industry-based, digital approach helps clients envision, build and run more innovative and efficient businesses.
ChiniMandi .com is the only portal which provides all the all the news of all the stake holders connected to the sugar value chain. The portal provides interviews of the who’s who of the Sugar Industry. All the government press releases are available on the portal.
In all, ChiniMandi.com serves all the news, updates & releases of the sugar industry under One Umbrella.
name: INNOPLATS INFOTECH PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Midfin Systems is a leading provider of enterprise solutions and services. We specialize in system-integration and managed solutions involving multi-cloud, edge-computing, Software-as-a-Service (SaaS), AI (Artificial Intelligence) and IoT (Internet of Things). We support customer choice in matters of pilots and production deployments across multi-cloud footprint – private, hybrid and public clouds. We bring highest value/cost to our customers in hardware, software and services.
name: Midfin Systems Private Limited

idea: TO CARRY ON IN INDIA OR ABROAD THE BUSINESS TO PROVIDE ALL KIND OF TELECOM INFRASTRUCTURE AND SERVICES, SUCH AS FTTH, ONU BOXES, PATCH CORD, OLT, WIFI ROUTER, SET TOP BOXES, WIRES & CABLES, PROVIDE ALL SERVICES UNDER UNIFIED LICENCE FOR VNO, AREA-WISE ACCESS SERVICES, NATIONAL LONG DISTANCE SERVICES, INTERNATIONAL LONG DISTANCE SERVICES, GLOBAL MOBILE PERSONAL COMMUNICATION BY SATELLITE SERVICES, PUBLIC MOBILE RADIO TRUNKING SERVICE, VSAT CUG SERVICES, INSAT MSS REPORTING(MSS-R) SERVICES, RESALE OF INTERNATIONAL PRIVATE LEASED CIRCUIT(IPLC) SERVICES TELECOM WIRES, CABLE AND CABLE LAYING INCLUDING INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY NETWORKING AND INTERNET SERVICES.
name: OPTICOM INFOWAY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
the first thing waking up in the morning we look for Toothpaste and toothbrush...... And over a period as I grew up I realized how I struggled squeezing the toothpaste tube till the last drop... And finally we always generally end up leaving certain amount of paste left behind in the tube. I imagined if every house globally does the same practice and finally dumping the tube.... The amount of unused paste and the non recyclable plastic tube ends up landfills dumping ground remain for the next 500 yrs Non degradable.

As truly said necessity is the mother of invention decided to make a change in the conventional way of brushing teeth with toothpaste to Toothpaste tablets.And I noticed the hotels providing small toothpaste tube and plastic brush for the guest... Again I realized my single day stay would make the small tube and brush going once again into the dustbin and on wards to the dumping ground.Since we all love Mint flavour which brings early morning freshness after brush.... Nothing better to start a wonderful day with Mint freshness.... Hence I decided to go with this flavor... I'm sure you will love these little tabs and bring a good change and habit in making our universe Plastic Free... I am sure the kids and New generation understand the fury of nature which returned us with pandemic and now it's our turn to take care of the nature responsibly. And join us for Non plastic movement....
name: MINT DROPS LLP

idea:
Caudate Technologies is a System Integrator focused on working with cutting edge technologies including SD WAN (Software Defined WAN), Cyber Security , Cloud Computing & Artificial Intelligence/Machine learning driven Data Analytics solutions partnering with global OEMs including Cisco, Fortinet, VmWare, Lavelle Networks, CheckPoint etc..

The company’s client base includes large enterprises in BFSI, Pharma & Automotive segments in India. The company apart from making it’s presence strong in India is also foraying into Global Market.
name: CAUDATE TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATE LIMITED
